    • valid

      public boolean valid​(String oldPosition, String newPosition)
      Checks whether or not an intended move for a piece is valid or not.
      Parameters:
      oldPosition - inputs the old position of the piece on the chess board
      newPosition - inputs the new intended position of the piece on the chess board
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false if not

    • isPathClear

      public boolean isPathClear​(String oldPosition, String newPosition)
      Checks whether or not the piece has a clear path from its old position to its intended new position.
      Parameters:
      oldPosition -
      newPosition -
      Returns:
      true if the path is clear, false if there is an obstruction
